Floor
===

> Round a numeric value toward negative infinity.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var floor = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/floor' );
```

#### floor( x )

Rounds a `numeric` value toward negative infinity.

``` javascript
var v = floor( -4.2 );
// returns -5.0

v = floor( 9.99999 );
// returns 9.0

v = floor( 0.0 );
// returns 0.0

v = floor( NaN );
// returns NaN
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var floor = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/floor' );

var x;
var i;

for ( i = 0; i < 100; i++ ) {
    x = Math.random()*100.0 - 50.0;
    console.log( 'floor(%d) = %d', x, floor( x ) );
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->
